languages.text: "Прекратите вести себя с аколитом Святой Инквизиции словно на светском приеме в кругу воздыхателей. Вы слишком легкомысленны для главы великой династии".
"Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Прекратите вести себя с аколитом Святой Инквизиции словно на светском приеме в кругу воздыхателей. Вы слишком легкомысленны для главы великой династии".

traits.locale_text: "Stop behaving like you are at a social event surrounded by admirers when you are in the presence of the Holy Inquisition acolyte. For the head of the great dynasty, you are too light-headed."
"Stop behaving like you are at a social event surrounded by admirers when you are in the presence of the Holy Inquisition acolyte. For the head of the great dynasty, you are too light-headed."
"Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."
"Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."
"Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

languages.text: “不要像打发社交舞会上的倾慕者那样打发神圣审判庭的侍仆。你生性太过轻浮，根本不配成为这个显赫王朝的统治者。”
languages.original_text: "Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “不要像打发社交舞会上的倾慕者那样打发神圣审判庭的侍仆。你生性太过轻浮，根本不配成为这个显赫王朝的统治者。”

languages.text: «Deje de hablar con una acólita de la Santa Inquisición como si fuese {mf|un admirador|una admiradora} en una gala de postín. Es usted demasiado {mf|frívolo|frívola} para liderar una dinastía tan ilustre».
languages.original_text: "Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «Deje de hablar con una acólita de la Santa Inquisición como si fuese {mf|un admirador|una admiradora} en una gala de postín. Es usted demasiado {mf|frívolo|frívola} para liderar una dinastía tan ilustre».

languages.text: « Je vous prie de bien vouloir cesser de vous adresser à un acolyte de la Sainte Inquisition comme à un admirateur. J'ai peine à croire qu'une dynastie illustre comme la vôtre se retrouve entre les mains de quelqu'un d'aussi frivole. »
languages.original_text: "Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de bien vouloir cesser de vous adresser à un acolyte de la Sainte Inquisition comme à un admirateur. J'ai peine à croire qu'une dynastie illustre comme la vôtre se retrouve entre les mains de quelqu'un d'aussi frivole. »

languages.text: "Hört auf damit, einen Akolythen der Heiligen Inquisition wie einen Verehrer in feiner Gesellschaft anzusprechen. Ihr seid mit Eurem Charakter viel zu frivol, um einer so berühmten Dynastie vorzustehen."
languages.original_text: "Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf damit, einen Akolythen der Heiligen Inquisition wie einen Verehrer in feiner Gesellschaft anzusprechen. Ihr seid mit Eurem Charakter viel zu frivol, um einer so berühmten Dynastie vorzustehen."

languages.text: 「聖なる異端審問庁のアコライトを、上流社会の社交行事の参加者と同じように呼ぶのはやめてください。輝かしい王朝を率いるには、陛下はあまりにも軽薄な人間だ」
languages.original_text: "Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる異端審問庁のアコライトを、上流社会の社交行事の参加者と同じように呼ぶのはやめてください。輝かしい王朝を率いるには、陛下はあまりにも軽薄な人間だ」

languages.text: "Kutsal Engizisyon'un havarisine, yüksek sosyete davetinde karşılaştığın bir hayranmış gibi seslenmeyi kes. Böyle şanlı bir hanedanlığı yönetmek için fazla önemsiz birisin."
languages.original_text: "Stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Engizisyon'un havarisine, yüksek sosyete davetinde karşılaştığın bir hayranmış gibi seslenmeyi kes. Böyle şanlı bir hanedanlığı yönetmek için fazla önemsiz birisin."
